attributes.action: review the distribution of money raised by the national lottery.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
to distribute money raised by lottery sales to causes that in most peoples opinion, are very deserving, and in a civilised country should be financially supported. e.g.1. the air ambulance.2. to provide disabeled children with the correct powered wheelchair.3.to provide care homes for the elderly.plus many other similar causes...
the law for distributing the lottery cash needs to be reformed,to take into account the peoples wishes.
the new government needs to address this issue asap.
